body.p: The odtformulas-element must be contained in a definitions-element

This element loads formulas in MathML form from an OpenOffice document with formula-objects on it. The formulas are identified by a text paragraph immediately above the formula. This text, and thus the id, must start with _f. For instance _fMyintegral. These formulas are available by the PI , containing the appropriate ids.
Note that these formulas will be presented as MathML. See for a full description.

tr.td: The location of the document containg the formulas, absolute or relative to the script (anchor).
